channel.title: {317} I need to make it work! Will rep++ {317}
channel.description:

P.S. I need step by step instructions.
I will rep++

item.title: {317} I need to make it work! Will rep++ {317}
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Well first off, go to your sever files. go into your config folder, scroll down to the way bottom and open weaponHandler
//—Weapon-----Stand—Walk----Run----FightTy–Op1-----Op2-----Op3-----Op4—Block

you will probably see that. Now ctrl + f and search for your items id and it should look like this

id = 4718 2065 2064 -1 2 2067 2066 -1 -1 1666 //Dharoks Greataxe

Copy that and go into your other source and paste it anywhere within all of the other codes.
And the animation is in your class20.java (client files) look for the animation yourself
And the special gfx you should have in your models folder.

Read full topic
